title: Extensões

title: Cannot access x.com on my laptop using firefox.
content:
I bought a new laptop about a year ago and decided to set up a Twitter/X account using Firefox. I was instantly redirected to a page informing me that Firefox was a browser that was "no longer supported". The link to the Help Center gives me a list of compatible browsers, including Firefox.

This seemed odd to me because I could access it using Firefox on the two desktops I use at home. I accessed X using Chrome, Brave and Edge on the laptop but not Firefox. I've searched high and low for a solution but without success. Does anyone have a possible solution? Thanks, J
creator: johnnydouglastruth

title: FireFox Update November 1 2024
content: I just got an update overnight on November 1, 2024. None of my YouTube Saved Links will load a YouTube Video. Only a Blank Screen Shows Up. I can still use the YouTube search bar and find a video, but if I save the video and try to open the link or refresh the video, I get a blank screen again.
creator: andrewruf2002

title: Offline HTM files with images are no longer showing the images after version 126.0.1
content:
We work with generating reports as a HTM format which we then open in Firefox to export as a PDF. We choose Firefox to do this as it neatly splits up the pages without cutting content in half. However, after the 126 update, images that are part of the HTM file no longer loads, leaving a blank void.

Does anyone know why this is or whether they know how to fix it? It is a result of plugging a vulnerability in the browser?

Your help is very much appreciated.

Thank you.
creator: JL

title: Déblocage de compte
content:
Bonjour,

Mon compte Yahoo est bloqué et je n'arrive pas à le débloquer malgré la saisie des codes de récupération envoyés par leur serveur. On me dit que ça vient de mon navigateur Mozilla Firefox. Pouvez-vous intervenir ou me donner la marche à suivre?

Merci de votre prompte répone. Cordialement
creator: alainlemanach

title: Malwarebytes Browserguard
content: I have a repeatable issue. Every time I install Browserguard on Firefox, it only works properly immediately after the installation, before I close Firefox. Once I close Firefox and then reopen Firefox, Browserguard will not function properly. It does not block anything. Example. I open Edge, go to classicalfm dot ca, and Browserguard blocks 19 items. Go to the same website using Firefox, it blocks zero items. Why? Again, immediately after a fresh installation of Browserguard in Firefox, it will block those 19 items. If I close Firefox and then reopen Firefox, Browserguard blocks nothing. I fail to understand why. I want to be able to use Firefox with Browserguard properly working. Thanks in advance for any help. Cheers.
creator: jadc2012

title: GMX Mail Error mit Mozilla Firefox for Zorin 1.0 Version 132.0 (64-bit)
content:
I use Zorin OS 17 Pro and Mozilla Firefox for Zorin 1.0 Version 132.0 (64-bit).

Currently I get an error after logging in to gmx.net “Your browser is not supported.

You are trying to log in to your GMX mailbox with an outdated browser. For security reasons, this is not fully possible. We therefore recommend that you use an up-to-date browser. ”

Can you please fix this error?
creator: marcus.grunwald

title: Recover saved passwords after crash
content:
A while ago, my browser refused to start. Apparently it got corrupted during an update and i had to de- and re-install. That worked but i lost all bookmarks and saved passwords. Now i lost access to my email account because I cannot for the life of me remember my password. Google recovery keeps sending the recovery code to the same emailadres that i dont have access to. Other recovery stept arent working.

Is there a way for me to find the old saved passwords from before the re-install? Please, i need access because so many accounts on other websites use that email address. Please help me i dont know what to do.
creator: lauramvermeer

creator: bruce106

title: no audio in firefox
content:
I'm not getting audio playin in Firefox, and I can confirm audio plays okay in Chrome all okay. Have tried the following:..

(1) Checked the Firefox privacy settings for audio .. Nothing being blocked (2) Checked Windows mixer settings .. Nothing being blocked (3) Cleared browser cache in Firefox .. No changes (4) Undertook Firefox refresh .. No changes (5) Reinstalled audio drivers .. No changes (6) Downloaded Firefox Developers edition .. Audio does work

So my conclusion is that there is a problem with normal edition of Firefox with playing audio ?

What wrong here and how do I get it fixed please ?
creator: david_lofthouse

title: Latest version of Firefox breaks everything
content: I have been using Firefox for years and it has been my favorite browser. I am running on a laptop with Windows 10 at the latest version. Until the latest update to Firefox, all was great. Now, only after the latest version of Firefox, I consistently get messages about link timing out when I click on anything. Usually, it takes 2 or 3 clicks to open a new tab. What has happened with the latest version? Can I undo the latest version? Thanks for any help. I can't wait 30 seconds for every tab or window to open.

title: No authentication code
content: Occasionally after a power outage I have to reestablish my Mozilla account. I'm asked to enter my authentication code. Years ago, I was given a list of 8 different 10-digit authentication codes as well as a 32 character "Recovery Key". None of them have ever worked. I end up having to sign back in to my account using my Apple or Google accounts. How do I get my original Mozilla authentication code back or get a new one that works?

title: Possible Javascript display issue
content:
When I am on espn.com/fantasy team pages everything loads correctly except for one popup table that does not. It will occasionally display but usually doesn't. When it fails to display, the scrollbar disappears but nothing shows. I tried clearing cache and cookies (Ctrl + F5, Settings + Clear data, etc.), refreshing firefox, and disabling all addons/extensions but the problem persists. I also tried turning off hardware acceleration and turned off proxies and secure DNS but nothing worked. I noticed this "_error.js" message in the debugger:

module.exports = __NEXT_REGISTER_PAGE("/_error", function () { 

 var e = webpackJsonp(    [566],    {      1789: function (e, r, o) {        e.exports = o(288)      },    },    [1789],  )  return { page: e.default }

})


I do not have this issue on firefox android, only on desktop. Thank you.
creator: subzero936

title: Latest update keeps asking for master password
content: The new version keeps asking me for my master password even though I've previously put it in. What changed with the latest version (132.0)?
creator: danohall

title: Content is missing
content:
I was filling out a City of Portland nuisance complaint form, but the "SUBMIT" button would not appear in order for the complaint form to be transmitted. I could only scroll down so far -- there was nothing more, no page two, etc. Email to City confirmed the problem with the form was on my end. Then I used Safari to get that same City complaint form. Same site, same form. But, on Safari there was about a full page more to the form that had been missing on Firefox. Additional questions, boxes to check, spaces to fill, places to upload photos/files. And at the bottom of the form was the "SUBMIT" button. I don't think I've had this particular issue with other forms, questionnaires, etc. elsewhere. Is there a filter or something blocking random stuff?

I'm not able to Screenshot the page as shown in Safari, so: https://www.portland.gov/homelessness-impact-reduction/report-campsite I think I can "Add image" as a screenshot of the form as shown in Firefox . . . . . . . . . . . . . . oh well, turns out I don't know how to make all that happen. Thanks for whatever anyone can come up with.
creator: jabarnas
